website_summaries.verdict: Attention to detail and safety features make this a good option for smaller children.
pros: Realistic design that features a horn with engine sounds, clear windshield, folding mirrors, and LED headlights
Max speed is set low enough to keep children safe while still fast enough to keep them happy
cons: Charge time is a little long, but offers a decent two hours of play

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller car for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Box got a little smooshed by UPS (what a shock) but it was packed well inside so no damage. Assembly was very easy. But we'll need to wait 24 hours to charge the battery :). I didn't think about this, but the first thing my daughter did was try to open the door and she is easily frustrated. Since this is a smaller vehicle for a single kid, the doors are not functional. The primary reason I liked this car because I didn't have to spend over $200 to get a decent motorized vehicle, and it got good reviews on amazon and on external sites.
customer_reviews.author: SRHadden

customer_reviews.title: like some other kids' cars
customer_reviews.text: This car is SO cute. It definitely doesn't go fast, nor can it go off road, like some other kids' cars, but that's OK with me because I wasn't looking for it to do those things! The car holds a charge really well and my daughter loves it. I took away one star just because the charging mechanism is SO annoying to get to. You have to use a tool (we use a flat head screwdriver) to disconnect the battery - I actually can't even do it, I always have to ask my husband! Very annoying. Make it easier to charge and you get 5 stars!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Best for ages 2 to 4, 1 yr old can play inside it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. I am going to add a battery upgrade when she turns 4 as a birthday present “engine upgrade”. It worked as expected and at a great 1/2 price from other designs. Driver Door does Not function but the style is on point. Great lightweight design. Not much extra room under the seat to stow items. It’s slow but not too slow. Not wanting my child to crash or get away was important to me. Tires are pretty good. I may upgrade tires too but this seems unnecessary. Our Main use is on sidewalks. It bogs down on grass but i think that’s a battery power thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice car, easy to assemble. She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for our granddaughter and she loved it. Very easy to put together. The only negative thing I have to say the description states one door opens. It doesn't open.
customer_reviews.author: Pdune

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts!
customer_reviews.text: These cars are really cute & are perfect for smaller kids ages 1-4. Kids older than 4 wouldn't fit comfortably. Unfortunately we had to send the car back because parts were missing & we weren't unable to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Door doesn't open. crappy small battery
customer_reviews.text: This could easily accomidate 2-3X the battery but it goes with the smallest possible, further it claims that one door opens but both are fully molded into the vehicle and no chance of opening. Overall a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AND SPORTY RIDE FOR A 3 YR OLD BEAUTY
customer_reviews.text: GREAT AND SPORTY RIDE FOR A 3 YR OLD BEAUTY. ALL SMILES AND HAPPINESS RIDING AROUND HER NEIGHBORHOOD. SHE LOVES IT AND I DO NOT REGRET A PENNY INVESTED. PERHAPS THIS WILL SUFFICE 'TIL SHE CAN PURCHASE HER OWN. WE ALL LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: bethann

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my son loves it! Only issue is that the back bumper does not fit easily together with the body of the car. The plastic was not molded correctly. But, I know my son is going to bang this car up anyways, so it didn't bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Merlina

customer_reviews.title: The color was beautiful and it fit her perfect. She is two.
customer_reviews.text: This car was so adorable and worked great. Wish I had a picture of our great granddaughter we purchased it for her Christmas. We loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara glisson

customer_reviews.title: Absolute joy for our grandson.
customer_reviews.text: Amazed that our grandson could drive with no fear. Very cute!

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great. Easy to assemble and my daughter love it. It looks like the real deal.

customer_reviews.title: Chains required in snow❄❄❄
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I got car for our 2year old Granddaughter for Christmas. She loves it, however they live in an area that has A Lot Of SNOW. So she needs to learn how to put on chains.

customer_reviews.title: ... over it i have had no problems and would recommend this to any and everyone

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: GREAT DEAL , WORKS FINE MY 2 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER LOVES IT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday gift for my four years old boy. He loves it so much!!

customer_reviews.title: They love them. Very realistic
customer_reviews.text: What a neat little car. This is the second one we have bought. One for each Granddaughter. They love them. Very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: L. Flack

customer_reviews.title: No remote
customer_reviews.text: Great car only thing that is missing is a remote
customer_reviews.author: Kizzel

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product. Wheels are constantly falling off ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality product. Wheels are constantly falling off and now the pin holding them on is gone! Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nanastewie8

customer_reviews.title: would be 4* if this item wires are not so easy to disconnect
customer_reviews.text: Wires are poorly connected. It lasted for 7 days. I just sent it back. All in all car is great but it is too powerful for three years old. He just got used to it an it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Sloba

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after the first use. Haven’t been able to get it to keep a charge since. Our son was soo happy to receive this Xmas morning so we are disappointed in our purchase. Battery replacements are costly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little car
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love driving this little car. Make sure it gets a complete 12 hour initial charge.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Poole

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect for her 4th birthday
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute car. my daughter loves it. it was perfect for her 4th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: They were very good about replacing it
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased did not work at all. They were very good about replacing it. So far the second one seems to be ok, it has only been a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Scordamalgia

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Why do you claim the door opens ? It does not. Totally disappointed and feel as if your description is fraudulent. Going to return. To expensive to not get what you thought you were buying.
customer_reviews.author: lwebb

customer_reviews.title: she loved it and wants to ride it all the time
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and according to the mom of the child, she loved it and wants to ride it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This car is my son’s one of favorite ride-on toy
customer_reviews.text: This car is my son’s one of favorite ride-on toy! Once charged it lasts hours of fun. We get a lot of compliments as well.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: love the s cool our 3 year old drives it around and is just obsessed with it!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Disliked. Parts missing, did not unpack until Christmas Eve. Ruined my granddaughters Christmas morning!

customer_reviews.title: 1 happy Princess
customer_reviews.text: I get mucho compliments when walking around with my 3yr old daughter driving. But more importantly my Princess is very happy. Headlights are a nice feature

customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it can grow into it a little hard for him to reach pedal, that’s ok he loves it

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered two Mini Cooper one of the cars is perfect fine,
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is not working at all I did get wrong tools I can’t adjusted it’s been charging three days nothing works

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves it but car didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: 4 yr old loves it, however after a few rides (6 or 7?) The car won't work, not sure if it's a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Charged battery for 24hrs on arrival, car never turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Maya

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good, but putting it together was difficult
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, but putting it together was difficult, now being enjoyed by a 3 yr old.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product durable and easy to set up. Lots of fun for the kid.

customer_reviews.title: he likes it and is having fun in it
customer_reviews.text: The charging system is inconvenient to use and the car seems to veer to the left when my grandson presses the accelerator. Over all, he likes it and is having fun in it.
customer_reviews.author: dgranum

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good little car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson and he hasn't even rode in it yet.Hubby got it all put together and so far,seems like a good little car.My complaint is,the stickers were put on poorly!Not a big deal in the grand scheme but i know they will crack before too long.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Copen

customer_reviews.title: ctly but figured it out. so far so good. for the cost comparatively  speaking a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: the Cooper was as expected. there was a slight problem with the back axl not being drilled corr

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it! Plus it matches my Mini Cooper S
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it! Plus it matches my Mini Cooper S! Other cool thing is I can fit in it(partially) and drive it in the house!!! Best Xmas ever.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Shoor

product_meta.title: Rollplay 6V Mini Cooper Kid's Ride-On Car - For Boys & Girls Ages 3 & Up - Battery-Powered Ride On Toy - Yellow
product_meta.description: The Rollplay mini Cooper 6 volt battery-powered ride-on was created with kids in mind: the car's design ensures a consistent, stable ride. The seating area has plenty of space for sure footing, while the easy to turn and swivel steering wheel makes the 6V mini Cooper easy for little hands to maneuver and avoid those tricky driving obstacles. The wheels and body boasts full lifelike design inside as well - which include a clear windshield, A detailed dashboard And real mirrors that fold. Sculpted from heavy-duty plastic, the car's frame is sure to stay free of rust and is guaranteed with a 1 year warranty and 6-month battery warranty that parents know they can count on. The Rollplay mini Cooper 6 volt ride-on is recommended for children 3+ years of age, with a maximum weight limit of 77 lbs. Minimal assembly is required before use. 2 AAA batteries required for the steering sounds, not included. Before using the vehicle for the first time, the battery must be charged for a full 24 hours (no more than 30 hours).
feature_bullets: Fun quality car: quality kid's car that reaches forward and reverse speeds of 2.5 mph for a safe and fun ride
Realistic and functional features: includes cup holder, clear windshield, and rubber traction strips for added stability
Luxury details: chrome details, backlit detailed dashboard, And engine noises & horn for a realistic feel
Meets safety standards: Meets children's safety standards for a protected and secure ride
Compact size and minimal assembly required: Overall Dimensions of 41.3 (L) x 20.3 (W) x 23.2 (H) in. Recommended weight capacity: 77 lbs, Ages 3 and up

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
